name: murmuration
description: Online elements of the murmuration installation at Great Ormond Street

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/ && mkdir ./dist && cp ./index.html ./dist/index.html && cp -avr ./sounds/ ./dist/ && cp -avr ./js/ ./dist/ && cp -avr ./css/ ./dist/ && cp ./one.html ./dist/one.html && cp ./many.html ./dist/many.html && cp -avr ./images/ ./dist/
